snippet: Esa-Pekka Salonen will embark on three years as composer in residence at the New York Philharmonic, and series will be devoted to Rachmaninoff, Messiaen and new music.
abstract: New York Philharmonic announces its 2015-16 season, which will feature start of three-year residency by composer and conductor Esa-Pekka Salonen.
lead_paragraph: Esa-Pekka Salonen will embark on three years as composer in residence at the New York Philharmonic, and series will be devoted to Rachmaninoff, Messiaen and new music.
